message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of meeting you halfway. I can do $135, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I can do $130, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $127. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go much lower than that, but I'm willing to meet you at $129. This is my final offer, so if you're interested, now's the time to make a decision.
